job_description: I once worked as a freelance video editor for a construction project. I have expertise in processing footage, compiling clips, and giving a professional touch to the development project video. I really enjoy working with clients in this industry and contributing to visualizing and communicating the value of development projects through visually appealing media. I am proud to be able to help present the work and achievements in development through the field of video editing.

My internship at Virtualspot.id participates in managing Instagram social media accounts, starting from creating Instagram feeds to video reels with the aim of increasing sales targets.
